::Spears:;

She got up and pulled a quill from her side and threw it at Savage.
She was getting mad.  Can't the Preds leave them alone for five 
minutes?  She atransformed into porcupine and slung 5 quills at 
Savage.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Striker::
> 
> Striker smiles, looking  into her eyes. "I'm glad y-"
> 
> He's interrupted as a fireball nearly hits him, passing inches over 
his head. 
> He swears, putting Spears down, his shoulder blasters emerging.
> 
> "Never a rest," he mutters, opening fire on Savage.
